item.title: HELP! Pest Control..(NPC Help)
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

I’m adding Pest control on my server, and I need help with the portal ‘drops’. Trying to make it add an item when you kill the portal…

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 3777) //final portal
{
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
ppl.sendMessage("Congratulations! You have won! Take these tickets! ");
ppl.teleportToX = 2657; 
ppl.teleportToY = 2639;
ItemHandler.addItem(620, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}

620 is the ticket ID…But it doesn’t add it to your inventory…and additem #### doesn’t work either…it gives me an error…any suggestions?

Read full topic
